resources:
CodeMaze> Issues: %s / %s Optimizers: %s Optimizers: %s / %s Optimizers: %s/%s Time Left: %s Score: %s Time: %s %s %s
SettingzActivity
Game Misc.
Your signature Default reply action
Visual Maze Generation When on, visually generate the maze one tile at a time. This also enables experimental random maze generation. This is a WIP. When off, instantly generate the maze upon loading game. This disables experimental random maze generation, so the maze path is randomly selected from a large group of pre-made preset paths.
Keep generating optimizers after goal has been met When on, after the optimizers goal has been met, optimizer tiles will still keep appearing forever. When off, no more optimizers will appear after the goal has been met and the Finish tile has appeared.
Sync email periodically Download incoming attachments Automatically download attachments for incoming emails Only download attachments when manually requested
Allow Vibrations Allow this game to vibrate the phone. This game will never vibrate your phone.
Rainbow Character When on, Character constantly changes colors, cycling though the rainbow. *Interferes with other Character color changes, this is a WIP setting* When off, Character stays normal white color, except when the character normally changes colors to indicate things like player health and damage taken. Android Logo Player Icon
